summary: Provides a Kubernetesâ€‘based batch materialization engine for Feast, encapsulating configuration, job creation, execution, monitoring, and cleanup of the Kubernetes resources required to materialize feature data from offline stores into online stores.
business_intent: Automate and scale Feast batch materialization workloads on a Kubernetes cluster, allowing users to define materialization jobs that run as Kubernetes jobs and manage their lifecycle without manual intervention.
